author: Lucas Nolan, Lucas Nolan
title: Facebook Pledges to Invest $100 Million in News Industry
description: Social media giant Facebook has pledged to invest $100 million in the news industry to promote journalism during the ongoing Wuhan coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Social media giant Facebook has pledged to invest $100 million in the news industry to promote journalism during the ongoing Wuhan coronavirus pandemic.
